text: @DrRPNishank @narendramodi @AmitShah @PMOIndia @HMOIndia @HRDMinistry @mygovindia @transformIndia @PIB_India @MIB_India @DDNewslive How can you do this to us.. For God's sake Postpone Neet and Jee exams.. Stop this mental torture.. Our lives and our parents lives are at stake. We can't give exam in this situation of covid19. #NoExamsInCovid #PostponeneetJee #StudentsLivesMatter #postponeneet2020 @ndtv
